item.title: Brad Feld – RSS and Venture Capital (11:45)
item.description: Brad Feld, a managing director of Mobius Venture Capital and an early investor in NewsGator, Technorati and FeedBurner, discusses why he has invested in RSS technology. Download....

item.title: Greg Reinacker – RSS Now and Future (16:22)
item.description: Greg Reinacker, founder and CTO of NewsGator and an advocate for RSS technology, talks about the idea behind NewsGator, what’s happening today and where RSS and NewsGator are heading in the future. Download....

item.title: Nick Bradbury – FeedDemon (7:29)
item.description: Nick Bradbury, creator and keeper of Feeddemon, tells how he created the popular desktop reader for Windows, and how users help him keep it up-to-date with cool, new features. Download....

item.title: J.B. Holston - The Benefits of RSS (13:39)
item.description: Holston, NewsGator CEO, gives a general overview of the benefits of RSS for web users and how quickly the technology is evolving beyond weblogs and newspapers. Download: holston_the_benefits_of_rss.mp3...
item.content:encoded:
Holston, NewsGator CEO, gives a general overview of the benefits of RSS for web users and how quickly the technology is evolving beyond weblogs and newspapers.
